description: This file defines a React functional component 'EditNoteModal' for editing or creating notes within a mobile application. It manages input fields for title and content, handles save and delete actions, and applies styling for a modal overlay.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving the note, updating or creating based on presence of initial id, then calls onSaved callback.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deleting the note if initial id exists, then calls onSaved callback.
